name: TeeVee Birds
description:
TeeVee Birds is still in developement and with plans for Android/IOS. 

This game started as an attempt at making a game in ONE HOUR!  However, I ended up wanting to pour more time into this Flappy Bird inspired game. Over the past month I have worked slowly been ironing out the idea and pondering the future of TeeVee Birds. I am excited the share with you my video game. I hope you enjoy!

Controls
  • Space - Move up and flap wings
  • A + D - Move left and right
  • Q - Bird Chirp

Please comment for ways to improve, and share your ideas.
